articles.author: Bryan Clark
articles.title: US House Science Committee tweet is the perfect prelude to Trump's America
articles.description: If you had any misgivings about Donald Trump’s impact on climate change, look no further than the House of Representatives Committee on Science, Space, and Technology’s Twitter feed. The committee today retweeted a story from Breitbart, of all places, about the ‘myth’ of climate change. Another group ‘dealing’ w/ climate change in a non-scientific way, along w/ the …

articles.author: Napier Lopez
articles.title: Review: Fabriq's stylish Bluetooth speaker is like an Amazon and Sonos lovechild
articles.description: We’ve seen voice assistants integrated into small household speakers the likes of Google Home and Amazon Echo, but what about the more common, portable Bluetooth speaker variety? That’s what the market the Alexa-powered Fabriq speaker aims to address. It’s a cute little speaker, and I’m particularly for of the red ‘Jack Plaid’ of my review …

articles.author: Bryan Clark
articles.title: This sperm test via smartphone proves there's an app for everything
articles.description: Fertility clinics probably aren’t the most comfortable places to “extract” sperm. I haven’t had the pleasure, but being handed a receptacle and led into a room with visual aids and hearing that door close behind you has to be a bit awkward. More awkward is the thought that everyone outside this room knows the dirty …

articles.author: Bryan Clark
articles.title: Study: 99% of fake Apple chargers are dangerous
articles.description: You’d be forgiven for assuming fake Apple chargers were only lacking the (legitimate) logo. Thousands of these are sold each year, and according to a recent study: 99 percent of them failed safety tests. Commissioned by the Chartered Trading Standards Institute (CTSI) — the UK consumer protection body — the study tested 400 chargers purchased online, …

articles.author: Bryan Clark
articles.title: DJ Earworm's annual mashup reminds us that 2016 was godawful
articles.description: There are few things we look forward to more than DJ Earworm’s annual mashup. Through carefully chosen lyrics and placement, this year’s ‘United States of Pop’ — the orgasmic recap of the year’s hits coupled with intricately-edited video — reminds all of us that 2016 was definitely one to forget. Starting with a line from …

articles.author: Napier Lopez
articles.title: Mouse scroll wheel 'inventor' basically says we're all using it wrong
articles.description: If you use a mouse with your computer, you probably use a scroll wheel. Except, you’re probably using it wrong. Europe, are you ready? TNW Conference is back for its 12th year. Reserve your 2-for-1 ticket voucher now. TELL ME MORE! At least, that’s what possible scroll wheel ‘inventor’ and Oculus Co-Founder Jack McCauley says …

articles.author: Napier Lopez
articles.title: Motorola wants to release four Moto Z Mods per quarter next year
articles.description: After the LG G5‘s lackluster reception and Google scrapping Project Ara, Motorola’s Moto Z line seems to be the last hope for modular phones. Of course, that won’t work if you don’t have any mods to use, but Motorola says it’s hoping to deliver a relative onslaught of them next year. According to Phandroid, the company …
